description.text: The breakfast club is part of any complete breakfast. The bread is also a bit stale which makes it great for bashing monsters with. Awesome!
These are tiny trampolines for your feet! Since you can jump higher, you'll be able to see traps from further away! If you're feeling saucy, try and do a backflip -- I double dare you!
This is your tube of Pogs. There are many like it, but this one is yours. It contains a few pogs. If you're lucky, you might even get a slammer!
It's a Pog! Don't know what a Pog is? Neither does the rest of the world... at least you can throw it at people!
It's a Pog Slammer! It's like a normal Pog but bigger, badder and made of metal! Not much use as a collectible anymore... it sure would hurt if your threw it at someone though!
